document.full_text: gov. mitch daniels of indiana called the leisurely pace of the 2012 presidential campaign 'a blessing' for voters. he has not said whether he will join the race.
document.title: political memo: a potential candidate in no rush for a race
lines_and_colors: gov. mitch daniels of indiana called the leisurely pace of the 2012 presidential campaign 'a blessing' for voters. he has not said whether he will join the race.
